 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package no.hig.haalaptob.irc

Class Summary
AddNewServerGUI AddNewServerGUI.java This class presents a simple gridlayout with the needed textfields to create and add a new server.
BlinkingDesktopButtons BlinkingDesktopButtons.java This class is a Runnable class that receives a JButton and make it "blink" by changing border and background color until the owner cancel it
ChannelLists ChannelList.java This class presents a list of all the channels in a connected server.
ChannelView Class for holding the functions and GUI for the channels The purpose of this class is to provide the application with channel GUI and functions for all the action that will be triggered by different user actions.
ConView This is the view that holds the server connection information.
EditServerGUI This class present a simple Gridlayout so the user can edit informasion about an existing server.
Help Class that holds the Help functionality The class allows the user to be guided "around" the functionality in cIRCle
HyperLink Class for handling different events triggered by the Help class
Layout Class that contains the main layout of the program, such as Toolbars, menus, buttons and so on.
LoginGUI The class that present a GridbagLayout with dropdownboxes containing available servers, textfield that accept user input for needed information such as nickname and button with option to add/edit server information.
Main This class is where the application starts in the first case.
Prefs This class holds the user preferences in the program This function stores for instance userDefinedColors, nicknames and so on.
PrivateMessageView This class manages the private message view.
Server This class will only be used if the program doesn't find any customized server information file.
ServerFileOut This class handle saving server information to file.
ServerFileRead This class will either start the process of reading from the "ServerCustomInfo.txt" file if it exist, or else it will read from mIrc's "Server.ini" file and then generate the file "ServerCustomInfo.txt" and then read it
SortedServers This class contains the information from the customized server information file ("ServerCustomInfo.txt" by default).
UserDefinedGUI This Class allows the users to change certain textcolor, fonts and sizes.
WindowBar This class represents the statusbar in the program, which shows all open channels + connection window.
